PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-14491998-08-260,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by revising section 6200 so as to ensure that a security acquired by a taxpayer from a non-arm's length person is not a "prescribed security" where that person is subject to the rules in subsection 39(4) of the Act before the taxpayer acquired it.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0418 Publication Date: 1998-09-16
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by revising section 6200 so
as to ensure that a security acquired by a taxpayer from a non-arm's length
person is not a "prescribed security" where that person is subject to the
rules in subsection 39(4) of the Act before the taxpayer acquired it.
